summary: On his book tour, Michael Moore exposes more wrongdoing by greedy big businesses and callous politicians around America.
cast: Michael Moore|Elaine Bly|Dan Burns|Chip Carter|Bill Clinton|Jim Czarnecki|Brian Danitz|Robert Dornan|Joel Feick|Steve Forbes|Doug France|Mary Gielow|Bev Jacowski|Richard Jewell|Kevin Keane|Garrison Keillor|Andy Crash Kelly|Phil Knight|Tia Lessin|Mike McCurry|Diane Mitchell|Rick Nielsen|Keith Peters|Loretta Sanchez|Chris Smith|Jerry Springer|Studs Terkel|Armstrong Williams
title: The big one
